metadata.title: CVE-2024-7347 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
NGINX Open Source and NGINX Plus have a vulnerability in thengx_http_mp4_module, which might allow an attacker to over-read NGINXworker memory resulting in its termination, using a specially crafted mp4file. The issue only affects NGINX if it is built with thengx_http_mp4_module and the mp4 directive is used in the configurationfile. Additionally, the attack is possible only if an attacker can triggerthe processing of a specially crafted mp4 file with thengx_http_mp4_module.Â  Note: Software versions which have reached End ofTechnical Support (EoTS) are not evaluated.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-7347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnginx-mod-http-auth-pam - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-cache-purge - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-dav-ext - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-echo - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-fancyindex - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-geoip - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-headers-more-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-image-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-lua - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-ndk - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-perl - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-subs-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-uploadprogress - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-upstream-fair - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-http-xslt-filter - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-mail - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-nchan - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-rtmp - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
libnginx-mod-stream - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
nginx - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
nginx-common - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
nginx-core - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
nginx-extras - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
nginx-full - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
nginx-light - 1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nginx package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.14.0-0ubuntu1.11+esm1').
